sect1.title: Overview
sect1.para: The validation classes available from the Xyster Framework are listed here. Remember to add the Xyster\Validate namespace to the options when using Zend_Validate.
For more information about the use of validation classes, see the Zend Framework documentation for Zend_Validate.

sect2.title: Validators
sect2.simpara: This is a list of some of the validators inculded with Xyster.

glossdef.para: Verifies the value is a number (with or without a decimal).
The URI validator simply uses the Zend_Uri class to determine if a value is a valid URI.
